pli-tv-bu-vb-sk38:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk38:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk38:1.3: “Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk38:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ oloketi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
